thread.title: Brooks Nader's ex-husband is dating a glamorous Southern Charm star amid their divorce
thread.title_full: Brooks Nader's ex-husband is dating a glamorous Southern Charm star amid their divorce

author: ExpressDigest
title: Brooks Nader's ex-husband is dating a glamorous Southern Charm star amid their divorce
text:
By ASHLEIGH GRAY FOR DAILYMAIL.COM
Published: 01:20 BST, 1 May 2025 | Updated: 01:20 BST, 1 May 2025
Brooks Nader’s estranged husband Billy Haire is in a new romance with former Southern Charm star Naomie Olindo.
Naomie, 32, and the hunky businessman took their relationship public on Tuesday as they each posted a loved-up photo of them on a boat via social media.
Haire shared the image first, with Olindo reposting it and adding a single red heart emoji for her 729,000 Instagram followers to see.
Naomie was clad in a patterned bikini, straw hat and sunglasses while Billy wore a black T-shirt, towel, and backwards baseball cap.
It comes one year after the NYU business school graduate announced his split from former Dancing with the Stars contestant Brooks.
Nader and Haire tied the knot on December 14, 2019 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Brooks Nader ‘s estranged husband Billy Haire is in a new romance with former Southern Charm star Naomie Olindo
Brooks seen on April 24
News first broke of their split in May 2024 after a rep for Nader confirmed to People that they were ‘divorcing after living apart for months.’
‘The split is amicable,’ the insider said. ‘She’s a busy person and career wise she’s on top of the world.
‘All relationships are hard and some can be salvaged, some can’t. They’re both truly amazing people. They have just decided to go their separate ways,’ it was added.
As recently as January, the Sports Illustrated cover girl revealed she was still legally married to her ex.
It came amid her sizzling relationship with DWTS coach Gleb Savchenko.
Eight months after she filed for divorce, Brooks appeared on TikTok and gave an update on her and her ex Billy’s status.
She captioned a video, ‘Plot twist: still legally married.’
The comments of the post were full of her followers advising her to ‘get those papers going.’
Nader and Haire tied the knot on December 14, 2019 in New Orleans, Louisiana. They announced their plan to divorce in May 2024; pictured in 2022
For her part, Naomie was in a relationship with fellow Southern Charm star Craig Conover before they went their separate ways in 2017; pictured in 2021
Other fans predicted that Savchenko was going to propose ‘the day the divorce is finalized.’
Nader and Savchenko struck up an on-off romance when they became dance partners on DWTS in September 2024. They most recently ended their relationship in April, with Brooks pulling the plug.
For her part, Naomie was in a relationship with fellow Southern Charm star Craig Conover before they went their separate ways in 2017.
She went on to date Metul Shah, eventually breaking up with him in 2021 over alleged infidelity.
‘[We’re] definitely better as friends,’ Olindo told Us Weekly of where she stood with Craig in 2022.
‘We learned so much from each other and from the whole situation that there’s no way either one of us could regret that.’
:
Brooks Nader’s ex-husband is dating a glamorous Southern Charm star amid their divorce
***
